name: Velvet age defying face cream 1.0oz
description:
Feel the difference in your first application. You will truly marvel at the exceptional beauty you see in the mirror!

Flower Essences and Gem Elixirs are added to Essential Oils to create a marvelous synergy. All natural and certified organic. Each jar is lovingly prepared by hand.


Suggested Use: A little goes a long way. Using morning and evening each jar will last approx. 4-6 weeks. Primarily a face cream, it can also be used for the hands, feet, elbows and all other areas of the body. Suitable for ALL skin types.

"This is the best face serum ever!!!

name: Nail Magic - 0.25 oz.
description:
Benefits: Strengthens the nail. Hydrating to nail bed and cuticle. Helps prevent hangnails. Promotes Growth.Highly nourishing and moisturizing.

Ingredients - Essential Oils: 
Black Currant Oil - Contains GLA (gamma-linolenic acid), an essential fatty acid of particular benefit to the nail and cuticle.
Lemon - Improves circulation to the nail and encourages the exfoliation of dead skin. 
Strengthens dry brittle nails. 
Bleaches nail bed.
Jojoba - Insures deep penetration of all of the above. 

Gem Elixirs: 
Petrified Wood - It's signature being hardened wood, gives extra strength to the nail.

Suggested use: Apply to nails every evening before retiring. 
Remedy works best while you are sleeping allowing for the deepest healing. Massage into cuticles whenever needed.
Each bottle will last approx. 6 - 8 weeks.

name: *Sanctuary Bath Salts - 8.0 oz.
description:
Benefits: Relieves Pain, Diminishes Depression, Dissapates Anger and Nervousness.

Ingredients: Dead Sea Salts; Epsom Salt; Essential Oils of Peppermint, Spearmint and Wintergreen;
Flower Essences of Evening Nightshade, and Red Chili Pepper; Vegetable glycerine.

Suggested use: Add 1/4 cup (2 oz.) to running bath. 
Light a candle, play some soothing music and escape to a blissful dimension of harmony!

Added suggestion: Half a lemon rubbed around a clean tub before filling will elevate the vibration of the water.

Spearmint - Reduces muscle spasms, improves digestion. The oldest of 
all mints. 
Peppermint - Eases nervous headaches, including migraines. Effective against fungus and herpes simplex.
Wintergreen - Excellent pain reliever. Provides soothing heat to sore muscles. Smooths calloused skin.
Evening Night Shade - Cooling and relaxing in the summer and warming in the winter.
Red Chili Peppers - Eases body aches. Stimulates decongestion. 
Vegetable Glycerin - Softens bath water. Moisturizing to the skin.
Salts - Help to eliminate toxins and reduce pain. 
Cleansing and healing.
Elevates the soul.

name: *Lavender Body Dust - 4.0 oz.
description:
Talc-Free Dusting Powder for the Entire Body!
Slightly dust entire body after bath or shower. 
Provides a protective barrier to the skin. 
Sprinkle into shoes for very happy feet.
Very effective for athlete's foot. 
Each canister will last months.

name: French Clay Herbal Masques - Non Allergenic 1.5 oz
description:
Suggested use: Mix one (1) part powder to two (2) parts *liquids of choice. Apply to face and leave 10-15 minutes. Remove with warm towel. 
Added suggestion: Open pores with hot towel or steam face before applying masque. Contains approx. 6 masques.

Normal to Oily Masque. Cleansing and detoxifying. Regulates oil production. Stimulates circulation. Cleansing, toning and relieves facial tension.
(also in Normal to Dry skin)
